#### event
KeyboardEvent

| method | valueType |
| ----- | ----- |
| event.altKey | bool |
| event.ctrlKey | bool |
| event.shiftKey | bool |
| event.key | string(key name) |
| event.keyCode | Integer(key code) |
| event.repeat | bool(キー押し続くときはtrue表示する) |



- key code

| key  | code  |
| ------------ | ------------ |
|   |   |
|   |   |
